resources.string:
Hi, my name is Nacho. 

I love developing for mobile. 

I like doing it for Android, but Kotlin Multiplatform will be the future as well. 
Check my repositories in GitHub :) https://github.com/IgnacioGarcia198 
Fun fact is that I can walk handstanding. Also I make a Pokemon Quiz app but couldn't make it public 
in Play Store because of the copyright ^^U 

I also like running. The last year in Japan I almost had no time to run so I need training now. 
And sometimes I do callisthenics as well. 
I like writing from time to time as well, you could check this blog: http://comolasondassonoras.blogspot.com :) 
My wife is Japanese and very strict, yes sir!. 
少しでも私も日本語が出来ます。もしもし？きつねさんではないでしょうか。
